info.name: YouTube Left Column Scrollable (March 2018)
info.description: Restores vertical scroll bar on the left column when you hover it. Use "Install Style" for Stylish or Stylus; scroll down and use "Install style as userscript" for Tampermonkey or Violentmonkey.
info.additionalInfo: See: https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!topic/youtube/i0xE_oyHgfk * Updated March 26, 2018 10:12PM Pacific to show the scroll bar only on hover
